name: claude-learnings
description: Capture learnings, errors, and successes during Claude Code sessions. Review and sync to CLAUDE.md for persistent improvement.
author: Daniel Eskenazi

log.description: Log a learning, insight, or pattern for later review

log_error.description: Log an error or mistake for later review (forces type to warning)

log_success.description: Log a success or what worked well for later review (forces type to success)

review-learnings.description: Review pending learnings and sync approved ones to CLAUDE.md

checkpoint.description: Save current state for potential rewind

restore.description: View checkpoint state and optionally restore learnings queue
